summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the test, indicating potential issues that need immediate attention. It is recommended to investigate the root cause of the failure and optimize the page for better performance.
insights: The Time to First Byte (TTFB) metric is relatively low for all pages, indicating that the server response time is good.
The First Contentful Paint (FCP) metric is higher than the load time for the homepage, suggesting that there might be some non-critical resources that are delaying the rendering of the page.

The difference in load times between the homepage and the other pages could be due to the number and size of resources loaded. It is recommended to review these resources and optimize them for faster loading.
